varlet3.name: v-ripple
varlet3.description: When an element is clicked, it creates a water wave diffuse effect.
varlet3.description_zh: 当单击一个元素时，它会创建水波漫射效果。

params.name: color
params.description: The color of the water ripples

varlet3.name: v-lazy
varlet3.description: Loads when the image is visible.

params.name: loading
params.description: Loading images, and choose images that load as quickly as possible
params.description_zh: 加载中的图片，尽可能选择加载速度很快的图片

params.name: error
params.description: Failed to load the displayed picture

params.name: attempt
params.description: The number of times a reload was attempted when loading failed
params.description_zh: 加载失败时尝试重新加载的次数

params.name: throttleWait
params.description: Throttling time, the higher the value, the lower the frequency of event triggering
params.description_zh: 节流时间，数值越大事件触发频率越低

params.name: events
params.description: A list of events that triggered the visibility detection registration
params.description_zh: 触发可见性检测注册的事件列表

varlet3.name: v-hover
varlet3.description: Style binding when the pointer hovers over a bound element, or the current hover state can be obtained through a function, which can be selectively enabled on desktop or mobile.
varlet3.description_zh: 当指针悬停在绑定元素上时进行样式绑定，或者可以通过函数获取当前悬停状态，在桌面或移动设备上可以选择性地启用。
